text: Belonophora talbotii is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is found in Nigeria, Cameroon and Gabon. It is threatened by habitat loss.World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Belonophora talbotii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
